00029 /****************************************************************************************************/
00030 /*                                                                                                  */
00031 /*                                                                                                  */
00032 /*                                                                                                  */
00033 /****************************************************************************************************/
00034 TBTrackProducer::TBTrackProducer() : TBTrackBaseProcessor("TBTrackProducer") 
00035 {
00036   _description="TBTrackProducer" ;
00037    
00038   registerProcessorParameter( "TDCHitCollectionName" , 
00039                               "The name of the output collection which will contain the selected TDCHit." ,
00040                               _TDCHitColName ,
00041                               std::string("TBTrackTdcHits"));
00042 }
00043 
00044 
00045 /****************************************************************************************************/
00046 /*                                                                                                  */
00047 /*                                                                                                  */
00048 /*                                                                                                  */
00049 /****************************************************************************************************/
00050 void TBTrackProducer::ProcessEvent(LCEvent *evt) 
00051 {
00052 
00053   /* Check there are some constants*/
00054   if(!_alnConstantsValid || !_fitConstantsValid) 
00055     {
00056       if(!_alnConstantsValid) cout << "No valid AlnConstants" << endl;
00057       if(!_fitConstantsValid) cout << "No valid FitConstants" << endl;
00058       assert(false);   
00059     }
00060   
00061   /* If they have changed, update the track finder*/
00062   if(_alnConstantsUpdated) 
00063     {
00064       _finder.alnConstants(_alnConstants);
00065 
00066       if(printLevel(1)) 
00067         {
00068           cout<< "Updating TrackFinder with AlnConstants" << endl;
00069           _alnConstants.print(std::cout,name()+": ") << endl;
00070         }
00071     }
00072   
00073   if(_fitConstantsUpdated) 
00074     { 
00075       _finder.fitConstants(_fitConstants);
00076       
00077       if(printLevel(1)) 
00078         {
00079           cout << "Updating TrackFinder with FitConstants" << endl;
00080           _fitConstants.print(std::cout,name()+": ") << endl;
00081         }
00082     }
00083   
00084 
00085   streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n Will try to get collection "<<_TDCHitColName<<" of type "<<LCIO::LCINTVEC<<endl;
00086 
00087   const LCCollection* col = getCollection(evt, _TDCHitColName, LCIO::LCINTVEC, false);
00088   if (col == NULL)
00089     {
00090       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "TBTrackProducer::ProcessEvent() Track Collection not in event." << endl;
00091     }
00092   else
00093     {
00094       std::vector<int> vHits[2][4];
00095       
00096       if (col->getNumberOfElements() < 1)
00097         streamlog_out(DEBUG)<<"\n WARNING collection "<<_TDCHitColName<<" is empty, no tracks will be found"<<endl<<endl;
00098       
00099       for(int i(0); i < col->getNumberOfElements(); i++) 
00100         {
00101           const LCIntVec *q = dynamic_cast<const LCIntVec*>(col->getElementAt(i));
00102           
00103           for(unsigned j(0); j < q->size();j++) 
00104             {
00105               streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "LCIntVec " << i << "[" << j << "] = " << (*q)[j] << endl;      
00106             }
00107           
00108           const LCIntVec &v(*q);
00109           streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Element " << i << " has " << v.size()-1 << " hits " << endl;
00110           
00111           if(v[0] < 8) 
00112             {
00113               unsigned xy(v[0]&1);
00114               unsigned layer(v[0]>>1);
00115               
00116               for(unsigned j(1); j < v.size(); j++) 
00117                 {
00118                   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "X/Y " << xy << ", layer " << layer
00119                                << ", hit " << j-1 << " = " << v[j] << endl;
00120                   
00121                   vHits[xy][layer].push_back(v[j]);
00122                 }
00123             }
00124         }/*end loop over i*/
00125       
00126       std::vector<TrackProjection> vTrks[2][2][2];
00127       for(unsigned fb(0); fb < 2; fb++) 
00128         {
00129           for(unsigned eh(0); eh < 2; eh++) 
00130             {
00131               for(unsigned xy(0); xy < 2; xy++) 
00132                 {
00133                   vTrks[fb][eh][xy] = (_finder.find(fb, eh, xy, 
00134                                                     vHits[xy][0], vHits[xy][1], vHits[xy][2], vHits[xy][3]));
00135                   
00136                   streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "F/B " << fb << ", E/H " << eh << ", X/Y " << xy << " found "
00137                                << vTrks[fb][eh][xy].size() << " tracks" << endl;
00138                   if(printLevel(3)) 
00139                     {
00140                       for(unsigned i(0); i < vTrks[fb][eh][xy].size(); i++) 
00141                         {
00142                           vTrks[fb][eh][xy][i].print(std::cout,"TBTrackProducer: ");
00143                         }/*end loop over i*/
00144                     }
00145                   
00146                 }
00147             }
00148         }/*end loop over fb*/
00149       
00150       /* Make LCTrackPayload<TBTrackProjection> objects and put into output collection(s)*/
00151       
00152       /*create output collections (one X, one Y) if input coll exist.*/
00153       
00154       LCCollectionVec* outdcCol;
00155       
00156       for(unsigned fb(0); fb < 2; fb++) 
00157         {
00158           for(unsigned eh(0); eh < 2; eh++) 
00159             {
00160               for(unsigned xy(0); xy < 2; xy++) 
00161                 {
00162                   outdcCol = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT );
00163                   
00164                   if(fb==0 && eh==0 && xy==0) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackFEX");
00165                   if(fb==0 && eh==0 && xy==1) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackFEY");
00166                   if(fb==0 && eh==1 && xy==0) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackFHX");
00167                   if(fb==0 && eh==1 && xy==1) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackFHY");
00168                   if(fb==1 && eh==0 && xy==0) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackBEX");
00169                   if(fb==1 && eh==0 && xy==1) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackBEY");
00170                   if(fb==1 && eh==1 && xy==0) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackBHX");
00171                   if(fb==1 && eh==1 && xy==1) evt->addCollection(outdcCol, "TBTrackBHY");
00172                   
00173                   for(unsigned i(0); i < vTrks[fb][eh][xy].size(); i++) 
00174                     {
00175                       //LCPayload<TrackProjection> *p=new LCPayload<TrackProjection>(vTrks[fb][eh][xy][i]);
00176                       //outdcCol->addElement(dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject*>(p)) ;
00177                       outdcCol->addElement(vTrks[fb][eh][xy][i].get()) ;
00178                     }
00179                 }
00180             }
00181         }
00182     }//col in event
00183 
00184 }//process event
